channel.title: AST on Raku Programming

item.title: Make Empty
item.description: my $str = q :to/EOF/; Raku,Rust -- this is a comment Rakudo,Raku -- this is another comment Camelia,Camel EOF grammar MakeEmpty { token TOP { ^ <sentence>+ % <comment> $} token sentence { <words>+ % ',' \n } token comment { '-- ' <words>+ % ' ' \n } token words { \w+ } } class Action { method TOP($/) { make $/.

item.title: Actions 和抽象语法树
item.description: 有一段结构化的文本, 写一个 Grammar 来解析它：
